reviews: At first the elastic at the ankles was a little tight so I removed it and now I love the fit and comfort of these jeans! In Michigan the weather can change in an instant, so I know until it gets into the 70's I will be wearing these cozy jeans!

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Passt super , trägt überhaupt nicht auf!Der einzige Minuspunkt wäre, beim Ausziehen muss man die ganze Hose umdrehen, weil sie unten doch recht eng ist! Allerdings passt sie deshalb auch gut in die Stiefel! Deshalb fünf Sterne!!!

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Jeans wurde rasch und super verpackt geliefert. Sie sieht auch wirklich wie eine normale Jeans aus, nur schön warm gefüttert und zwar wirklich von oben bis unten, sogar die Po - Taschen sind von innen gefüttert. Super weich und bequem. Passform toll. Bei Größe 1,66m und ca 80 kg. Hab sonst Größe 40 bis 42 passt L.Die Hose sehr hoch geschnitten, mit einem schmalen Bein.Für den Preis ist in OrdnungKlare KaufempfehlungWerde die Hose nochmal kaufen auch für meine Mutter - da sie etwas kleiner ist diesmal dann  kurze Variante

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Agréable à porter, taille 36 très bien , élastique donc vraiment agréable, je le porte pour le jardin et travaux extérieurs, mais il est très joli en ville aussi .

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Warm, breathable and stylish! I bought grey, love this product! Thinking to buy some other colors too
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 20 December 2022

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: I'm always cold, so I finally started buying more fleece-lined clothes. These keep my legs warm and I am happy that I bought them. I would prefer a longer inseam though!-Sizing-I’m 5’3” and I bought "Elasticwaist Blue88" in medium when I was wearing about an eight in pants, but I couldn't get these on at all! The next winter I was down to a four or six - and these finally fit. Several reviewers said these ran large, but my experience is that the medium runs small.-Washing-These machine wash and dry easily, without any noticeable shrinking. Colorfast on the outside, fluffy warm on the inside. I wash these with my dark clothes.-Wearing-Thick fleece = bulky. The bulk isn’t unreasonable, but it is visible without a jacket. These pants are fairly stretchy, but my issue is the length. Walking is fine, but sitting gets uncomfortable because the pants are really tight on my kneecaps. So I pull these up to get more slack at the knees -which makes driving more comfortable- but then my ankles get cold because they've lost their cover. A longer inseam would be great. Until then I just need to be mindful about socks or boots to compensate for cold ankles at the expense of knee mobility.-Overall-Great buy! I can finally go outdoors in the winter and not freeze immediately. A longer inseam would be nice, but these are still worth buying if you’re always cold like me.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 22 December 2022

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Molto comodi e caldi anche a basse temperature. La qualità è buona e sono completamente foderati. La taglia è conforme.

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Es un pantalón calientito y cómodo. La elasticidad permite ajustarse perfecto al cuerpo sin apretar.

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Sehr schöne Jeans, passen genau. Ich habe mich an die Tabelle gehalten, und war richtig so. Die Jeans hält richtig warm.

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Ich habe mir die Hose für die tägliche Arbeit im Stall gekauft. -10 Grad sind kein Problem mit dieser Hose. Sie ist absolut angenehm zu tragen, sieht aus wie eine normale Jeans, fühlt sich auch so an. Innen angenehm weich, auch die hinteren Hosentaschen. Die vorderen Hosentaschen sind aus einfachem Futterstoff. Ich selbst habe sie mir eine Nummer kleiner gekauft weil ich meine Hosen lieber eng anliegend mag. Sie passt sich gut dem Bein an.Von der Qualität bin ich auch absolut begeistert. Wo normale Jeans durchs Reiten schnell reißen, sieht man bei dieser nichts. Die Farbe sieht selbst nach 20x waschen noch wie neu aus, auch das Futter innen ist mach wie vor fluffig und weich.Meine Kollegin hat sich auch direkt eine bestellt. Verdiente 5 Sterne!

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Confortable et doux à l'intérieur. Ça tient bien chaud. Le jean est de très bonne qualité. Taille grand. J'avais pris un autre pantalon en 36. D'habitude je mets du 38 ou du 36 selon les vêtements mais le 36 n'est pas serré. J'ai commandé celui-ci en 34 et il est parfait. J'adore

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Me lo lleve de viaje por varios días y cumplió su objetivo es calientito, me lo puse varias veces sin lavarlo y no se deformaba c veía bien.

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Compré uno por si me gustaba y he comprado dos más, quedan muy bonitos y encima no paso frío en el trabajo

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Very happy with my purchase! These jeans are so soft on the inside, fit great and have the right amount of stretch and best of all: they are warm!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 14 January 2024

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Diese Hose passt hervorragend. Ich trage eine 40. Sie ist sehr hoch geschnitten, mit einem schmalen Bein. Da sie sehr kuschelig gefüttert ist, friere ich seitdem nicht mehr bei langen Spaziergängen.

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Comfortable
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 27 January 2023

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: I purchased the large size. I was pleasantly surprised that these fit me like most of my size 8 jeans fit me. The inseam is plenty long. I have not washed them yet. If they shrink a bit that would actually be good. They have a bit of extra room, not tight at all, and easy to pull on. I have wide calves, and a bit of pudge at the waist. Because  of the fleece lining, they make me look a bit like I gained five pounds, and like I'm wearing an incontinence pad, ha ha!  If they were a bit tighter, I think they would look a bit better that way. Anyway I don't care, because it's cold outside. Getting into a cold car, or going out shopping without me whining about having cold legs is why I bought these. They are teddy-bear soft inside! They are lightly warm! They come up to my waist. The denim feels like real denim! I like the light blue color that I chose. I like the elastic waist with belt loops. (I usually wear a shirt or sweater over my jeans.) I think I want to order another pair of these jeans.UPDATE 1/31/22I liked these enough that I purchased a black pair with zipper fly, in medium size this time.The fit is more flattering than the large elastic waist ones I had previously purchased in light blue.I love the way they look and fit, but the chemical smell hasn't gone away after two washings. I think it must be something in the black dye; it's almost a sulfur smell. I hope after a couple more launderings that will go away.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 8 January 2022

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Jeans caldi e morbidi, le taglie vestono più grande, solitamente indosso una 42, avevo ordinato una M, ma risultava grande, tutto risolto con il reso e ordinato taglia S

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Der Preis ist etwas zu hoch. Aber sonst finde ich die Hose sehr bequem, schnell anzuziehen und schön wärmend

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: These pants are very warm and comfortable!  They sit high on the waist and stay up pretty well. I am 5ft 112 pounds and ordered a small in the dark blue.  I just ordered another pair in XS in light blue. As the small is comfortable, I still had some extra room, so trying a size down.  I will post my review after I receive them.

reviews: Son bonitos y abriga mucho.Lo unico que no me gusta mucho, es que tiene talla  muy alta y si te agachas se doblan un poco.

reviews: They're warm and fit well. Sometimes looks a little baggy because of the extra layer, but it's comfy and does the job

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Die Jeans 👖 ist sehr schick passt hervorragend wie angegossen und durch den Stretch Effekt super bequem, die Innenseite ist sehr kuschelig, bei dem kalten Wetter/Wind hält die Jeans sehr gut warm. Habe mir in einer anderen Farbe die Jeans gleich nochmal gekauft.

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean

reviews: Sono soddisfatta di averli comprati. Avevo preso la M e mi stavano larghi quindi li go cambiati con la S e adesso mi stanno perfetti. Di solito vesto una 42, sono un po larghi in vita ma con una cintura si risolve. Morbidissima l'imbottitura.. li adoro.

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: J'ai retourné une 2ème fois l'article parce qu'habituellement les tailles de fabrication Chine sont toujours trop petites. Je vais commander la taille en dessous en espérant qu'elle soit en stock.

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Ich bin 164cm gross und wiege 70 kg. Ich trage normal 40/42 und wollte Größe L bestellen, aber Amazon zeigte XL an, was ich auch bestellt habe. Die Jeans passt perfekt. Ist wunderbar warm. Kann sienur weiterempfehlen.

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Jean pour l'hiver. La taille L correspond bien. Le tissu est bien épais et de bonne qualité.Correspond exactement a ce que j'attendais.

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: I fluctuate between 6-8 in women or 7-9 in junior; I bought size medium and they fit perfectly. They are stretchy, but not too much. They stay on my waist and don't slide down. I didn't have to pull them back up throughout the day. They are very warm. I love the lining. They're not bulky. The fit very cute. I had lots of compliments. They're exactly what I was looking for!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 3 February 2024

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Jeans misura giusta, foderati .Ottimi per temperature invernali.

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Los pantalones son muy cómodos, quedan muy bien y son muy calentitos. Lo único que son de talle alto, pero eso ya lo indicaban en la descripción y contaba con ello, aunque no me guste. Pedí dos tallas M y L porque no sabía cuál me quedaría bien. Finalmente me quedan bien los de la M y devolví la L. Mido 168cm y peso 62-63kg por si os sirve de referencia.

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Passform ist klasse , im Winter prima warm  und der Preis ist auch okay.

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Très bien coupé, agréable à porter

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Very warm and comfortable.

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Item runs small and so will not stay up.  I spend the day pulling them back up.  Not fun.Are very nice and warm but will need to return them.  Hopefully a larger size will work.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 25 February 2022

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: So comfortable I don't want to switch to my pj's at night, bc my pj's aren't as comfortable or as cozy. I'm a solid size 14. When these arrived they looked too small. I thought there was a mistake, but when I tried them on they looked like really great (flattering) skinny jeans. They stretch with you, so they are great for everything, and they look like pricier jeans than they are. I get cold easily, so I added these to my collection of fleece lined pants. I like them more than my Eddie Bauer ones. Pretty much living in these until the weather warms. If you live somewhere cold or are going to be sitting somewhere that gets "cool" outside at night like bleachers, add a pair of these to your wardrobe. P.S. - They support everything you want supported without looking like you are trying to do that.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 9 January 2024

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Talla perfecto y es muy calentito.

reviews: Comfy and warm, but kind of long and heavy, so I pull up the legs a lot and am constantly pulling the zipper back up.

reviews: Ho comprato la taglia M e sono una 44 ma era enorme. Poco elastico quindi scende continuamente e risulta poco comodo . Peccato perché molto caldo.

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Essa calça é muito boa, seu design é excelente. Chegou muito rápido e veio muito bem embalada. O corte é de cintura bem alta e o modelo veste muito maior do que o que eu normalmente uso, então indico comprar pelo menos um tamanho menor, mas, de restante, recomendo a todos, pois ela é confortável e muito quentinha.

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Tolles Produkt

name: Yehopere Women's Winter Fleece Lined Jeans Slim Fit Warm Skinny High Waist Denim Jean
reviews: Look way better than expected.  No one would know they are lined.  Nice denim, warm and cozy, have done well in washer and dryer.  Only complaint is they are cut a bit short in the back and work themselves down.  I am pulling them up constantly but could not wear a smaller size.  Other than that they are very comfortable and have been my favorite pair of grab and go jeans this past winter.  I very well may order another pair but will get the ones with belt loops.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 5 May 2022

I am 5'6", 135lb, wear M, bought L and they were ok, but can't change the degree of discomfort. Beautiful design and very warm. But the fabric is hard as a rock.
